values:
Chloe stayed behind one of the many nooks and crannies on the TARDIS, listening to the familiar 'vworp vworp' noise the time machine made. She had escaped with her life; she was bruised and scratched up, her hair had been torn out of their braids and fell in fiery waves down her back, and her butt was going to kill her in the morning. But she was alive.

But she wasn't done yet.

Ten. Doc. 

He wasn't okay. So Chloe wasn't okay either.

So while the good Doctor sent everyone back to their worlds, Chloe stayed behind, hoping to stay hidden till everyone was gone.

- I _____ Chloe.
- Chloe is _____.
- Chloe likes to ______.
- I want to _____ Chloe.
- Chloe can ______.
- Someday Chloe will ______.
- Chloe reminds me of ______.
- Without Chloe, it will be _____.
- Right now, I bet Chloe is thinking about _____.
- Chloe makes me want to _______.
- If I could spend the day with Chloe, I'd _____.
- Chloe is made of _______.
- If I could be Chloe for a day, I'd ______.
- Chloe's alter-ego is __________.
- I want to give Chloe ______.

Chloe nearly bolted out of her chair, barely making it downstairs before tripping. She wondered what Ten had in mind, not that she figured it was anything bad. She just wasn't sure what it was. Not seeing anything in the front yard, she headed to the backyard instead, wondering what she should be looking for.

If my characters bother you personally, such as them being OOC for example, please comment. Really, you can comment about ANYTHING that is annoying you regarding my characters or I! This post is set to allow anonymous, so don't be afraid to speak your mind. Yes, everyone's doing it. My only character is Chloe. Fire away!

Chloe sighed as she shut her math book, Metal Santa's "Jesus Ate My Beef" blaring on the radio. "I can't do math like this," she moaned, "I need the hum of my computer to concentrate and stuff." She pouted, looking at the barren, burnt area on her desk where her computer had been till it blew up. It would be replaced in a couple of days, but till then, Chloe found herself bored. And missing people. "I wonder what all the nice community people are doing," she wondered, taking her teddy bear into her arms and holding it close.
So, I heard some people can world hop. I'll need some assitance to meet some people eventually. Can anyone help me out?
